page.title: 15Torphichen Civic Week 1985
page.content: Although Torphichen Gala Day has been in existence for many years the Civic Week has only recently started. The Civic Week is the week leading up to the Gala Day. It is a week of varied events and lots of fun. The 1985 Civic Week started with a Gymkhana on the Saturday followed by a Pet show on the Monday where children under 16 brought their pets to be judged by a stranger to the village. This is to avoid any accusations of favouritism. For the first time there was a Fancy Dress Football Match between the young men of the village who had to dress up in fancy dress and the Keep Fit Class who wore proper football strips. The men had all sorts of tricks up their sleeves such as water pistols, spray streamers and powder puffs. On the Thursday evening there was a Treasure Hunt and later on there was a disco.
